title: Can I buy the foundation course books of ICWAI? - Quora
tags: The Institute of Cost and Management Accountants of India (ICMAI)

response.answer_text: Yes, soon as your register as student for foundation course on ICMAI websites, you will pay a fee, which includes fee for books. They will get delivered to your home address which you will mention in your application form.
No need to buy icwa foundation books separately from market. When you take admission in this course, the course fee includes the same and the institute will provide the books.
